title: TC Rule 110 Snapshot
description: Snapshot of a Rule 110 cellular automaton state captured for TC manifest generation.

type.description: Discriminator indicating the manifest payload represents a Rule 110 snapshot.

tick.description: Simulation tick when the snapshot was captured.

width.description: Number of cells tracked for this snapshot frame.

cells.description: Ordered binary cell states for the captured frame (0 = inactive, 1 = active).

origin.description: Optional tag describing how the initial configuration was seeded.

metadata.description: Optional authoring metadata surfaced alongside the manifest payload.

rule.description: Rule identifier, fixed at 110 for this schema.

seed.description: Identifier or numeric seed used to generate the initial cell configuration.

notes.description: Free-form notes describing the captured state.
